title: Women's Perfect-T Short Sleeve Cotton Crewneck T-Shirt
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, great price', 'author': 'Caroline', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This is a great basic white T-shirt, especially for the price! I am 5’4”, 115 lbs, dress size 0/2, and ordered a small because it doesn’t come in an XS. I’ve only washed it once so far, but it is not see through. It has a relaxed fit. I love the sleeve length, not too short, not too long. Fabric is super soft and comfortable. I am hoping it stays white. Due to its cotton material, it does wrinkle a little bit, but otherwise love it and will order in more colors.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 19, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Runs large', 'author': 'vvv', 'rating': 5, 'content': "The only downside: this t-shirt runs large, so I would suggest that you order it in a size smaller than you normally wear.Does it shrink? No. It doesn't shrink - I tried to shrink it. That's a good thing if you order the right size.Is it soft: Absolutely. It's soft and feels great.Is it sheer? Yes. It's almost too sheer for me, but some people might like the sheerness.Construction: Very well made.Does it hold its shape? So far so good. Many inexpensive T-shirts lose their shape after being washed a few times.I recommend this t-shirt", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States April 23, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice shirt but it shrinks after washing', 'author': 'Paula Sanjines', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Things I liked about this shirt: Good fit for a curvy woman with a little bit of a menopausal belly. Neckline is good (not too tight to the neck). Good material, thick and a nice deep black color, pretty soft for 100% cotton. I personally really like the feel of 100% cotton as synthetic fabrics make me sweaty and itchy.Things I didn’t like: Well, it is 100% cotton so …. It will shrink. One of the things I had liked about it initially is that it was a little longer, hit below the hips so won’t ride up my belly as I am moving around. But once I washed and dried it it shrunk and became much shorter. I have since been stretching it out and hanging it up to dry but that just takes extra effort in my laundry routine.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 21, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality, Great Price!', 'author': 'Lisa', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I bought two of these t-shirts for the summer to relax in. I consistenly wear a size medium 8-10 in shirts and these are true to size for me. The fit is comfortable and does have some stretch. The sleeves hit just below my upper arm so they are not too long. The fabric is light weight but durable. The crew neck is not too high and sits just below my collar bone which is good for a summer shirt.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 2, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars It’s a short shrinker', 'author': 'Jenny Glazebrook', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'This shirt was fine when it first came and fit pretty nicely, I like the softness and weight of the material, but after wearing it a couple times it started to shrink. It didn’t shrink to where it necessarily got tighter and that part of it still fits fine but now it’s on the shorter side. I can still wear it and do every now and then but I don’t love the way it fits now because it feels weirdly wide and short. I have a fairly long torso so it may not be as bad on everyone and I’m sure a lot of people wouldn’t care that’s it’s a little shorter; but be aware that it’s going to end up shrinking shorter.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 3, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great for work or layering!', 'author': 'Blocki', 'rating': 5, 'content': "These shirts are my go-to for work and simple outfits! They have a nice straight-form look and the sleeves are roomy! The fabric is soft with good weight and doesn't trigger my sensitive eczema-prone skin. It's really hard to find GOOD straight t-shirts for women, but I love these and will continue purchasing!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 29, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable and Classic', 'author': 'gkanerva', 'rating': 5, 'content': "This Hanes Crewneck T-Shirt proved to be an exceptional find, especially considering its budget-friendly price of around $5 which during my college years was a saving grace. It is simple and versatile, this is an excellent choice for various purposes, with a few considerations regarding its texture.Budget-Friendly Excellence:The standout feature of this t-shirt is its remarkable value for money. Priced at approximately $5, it offers an unbeatable combination of affordability and quality. I bought 5 of these t-shirts that lasted me through my college years and looked great paired with anything! I had to get rid of a few of them over time due to deodorant built up (not the t-shirt's fault, it took me a while to realize that the culprit was a stick deodorant that ruined most of my clothes before I switches to spray) that I was not able to get rid of. PRO TIP: a mixture of dish washer soap, baking soda and hydrogen peroxide takes care of this issue (and odor) within a few hours with no exception! Anyway, I ended up repurchasing these shirts a few times because of their price, comfort and versatility.Crafting Potential:The t-shirt's plain design lends itself well to creative projects. Whether you're into crafting or looking for a canvas for appliques, the Hanes Crewneck T-Shirt serves as a blank slate, allowing for personalized touches and artistic expressions. I personally never tried using this t-shirt for crafting opportunities but I figured for the price it might be a great option for crafts enthusiasts!Texture Consideration:While the t-shirt boasts various merits, one consideration is its texture. It may not be the softest option available, which could be a potential downside for those who prioritize a plush feel. However, it's well worth the money and I believe that the lack of softness and stretch helped extend the longevity of this shirt as it never got stretched out and the crewneck remained intact after many rounds of going through the washer and dryer and less than gentle handling!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 3, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Great T.', 'author': 'Rochelle', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I am always on the lookout for a great red shirt. The price point on this T was incredible. Love the shirt, just wish it was a little bit longer. I will definitely wear it.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 25, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Yay for a Perfect -T', 'author': 'shopping_turtle', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I ordered from this page but the email I got said that my Nano-Ts are on the way. I love the black perfect -T that I got around Christmas and wanted to get the same one in different colors However, many reviews said receiving Nano-Ts when they ordered from this site. I thought I was going to be victimized too but the 3 shirts I received today are all Perfect -T so yayy!! I don't like clingy clothes and I read that Nano-Ts are fitted versus Perfect -Ts.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 26, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Great shirt', 'author': 'dede4007', 'rating': 4, 'content': "I always likes Hanes quality. But this shirt I have a question about. It says 100% cotton, but the feel of it didn't quite feel like that. I stretched it, and sure enough the shirt stretched out, and then back. Cotton DOESN'T stretch at all, but spandex does, and the tag says nothing about spandex. I wanted all cotton. Not another blended material. The USA has laws about false advertising, and yet the clothes on Amazon are getting more and more dishonest in their advertising and labelsz saying it's one thing, yet turns out to be another. This is not right or fair to the buyers. Especially to those who have allergies to certain fabrics and chemicals.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 26, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

Currently 195 lbs, due to pandemic inactivity, and cortisol/age weight. Pre-pandemic 135 lbs. I bought these for everyday WFH and sleep shirt. One really can\'t go wrong with Amazon Basics as far as price for a fairly decent quality material. It\'s exactly as the brand describes in it\'s name... Basic. The material is not too thin to the point of being poorly made, neither is it above average quality that will last years. My only reason for giving this particular v-neck shirt set 3 stars is because it\'s a slimmer/tighter fit in than other XL shirts and tank tops I\'ve purchased, where the XL is very loose and I feel I would have done better with a L for a loose but not too loose fit, or M for a more for fitting fit. The sleeves are very short, about 1.5 inch from inner armpit seam. Due to it being slimmer fitting I find myself constantly trying to pull it out from my pits where it bunches up. For me, personally, that\'s annoying. Otherwise, it gives way well enough around my bust (36B bra size), waist (size 12-16 depending on adeno/endometriosis bloating) and hips. The shirt falls below the hip and, surprisingly, covers my fupa, :D LOL (bloating or not)! You know what I\'m talking about, ladies!To sum it up: True to size if you\'re looking for form fitting, curvy or slim ladies. My decision to go up one size made for a perfect proving to be a smart choice for me. It was not too tight as to be uncomfortable yet smooth and soft against my skin.I cut the tags on my LONG SLEEVE MINT GREEN shirt and cut so close that I have a small hole in that shirt. I’m considering replacing that particular item because the color, look and feel of the fabric suits me but not sure if further investment is deserving. I decided to CAREFULLY cut the tags on my other purchases and succeeded without causing damage.Clearly I plan on keeping my items BUT this is a caution with regards to the tags near the bottom of these tops.In these times of replacing large labeling that contain annoying stitching with other options, I’m perplexed that Abardsion would not have considered doing something better than this.One more thing to note is the items washing instructions are cold wash; no tumble dry. Because of the small hole in my mint green shirt, I decided to do a test with regular warm wash/cold rinse and tumble dry. The top came out beautifully. title: Women's Slim-Fit Short-Sleeve V-Neck T-Shirt, Pack of 2
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish, comfortable, and great color - pay attention to sizing', 'author': 'Terre', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Love the color, comfort, and style of these, overall good value. Perfect V neck and not too plunging, wonderful stretch w/out being flimsy. I ordered a SMALL in golden yellow & white (2 t-shirts in the pack). Great value for $19. They are slim-fitted as described, and the small is definitely a fitted small. I\'m 5\'7" and 121 lbs, usually an XS or S on top (32DD), and feel this style is very flattering and great for layering too. Would recommend.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 25, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars High quality!!!', 'author': 'amazon customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'These are really nice!! Very high quality at a good price! They are more fitted, which I love. The material is great!!! Soft and comfortable, has some stretch, washes well, good color, not sheer or see through. Really nice. Nice enough to go under a jacket or blazer.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 22, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': "4.0 out of 5 stars Don't believe reviews saying it fits tight", 'author': 'Carole Ann', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'These t shirts are both quite long and quite large. At over 5\'10", that works fairly well for me, though.I had read in some reviews that they were quite form-fitting, so I ordered an XL, which seemed to fit my measurements as well according to the chart. I guess they aren\'t hanging off me, but they are definitely on the loose side given that they are rib knit, and the shoulders are large, whereas I have a rather athletic build. Probably not a good choice for someone with a larger tummy, as I often find tops are tight in the shoulders and hang several inches behind me in the back. This style has perhaps an extra half inch in the shoulders and a half inch to an inch down the sides of my waist, so I assume (unless you want it figure-hugging, in which case you\'re fine, just buy a smaller size) that it is cut more for an athletic V or a straight-ish H figure.They have a nice thickness to them and the fabric looks good. I purchased black and royal blue, so I can\'t really speak to transparency; these dark shades are completely opaque! I love the blue. It\'s a gorgeous shade that brightens my face and yet is easy to wear. I\'m the sort of person who looks good in jewel tones, but I don\'t like huge contrasts and I don\'t feel comfortable in head-to-toe colour. The blue will work with both my print skirts and should look good with blue or black jeans without a screaming contrast.Before closing, I guess I should mention that there were no flaws, no threads hanging off. Another thing that may be of interest is that the V isn\'t very pointy. It\'s a little bit wide and doesn\'t come to a sharp point. I probably should have got a smaller size so my shoulders would have pulled it out and made the neck more open. It probably would have looked better, as it isn\'t very deep on me; I feel like perhaps the t shirt is meant to be pulled taut on the body, but that is not my case. Looks like good quality, though (I haven\'t washed it yet). And I do like the colours I chose. Wish I had gone down at least one size and chosen more colours, though.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 8, 2021', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars The Material is Much Softer then Hanes', 'author': 'LVA', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Since I love the comfort of t shirts decided to buy Amazon vs Hanes. Found Amazon'd shirts to be softer and stretchier than Hanes. Price is comparable. The blue color is very flattering. And both work well as stand alone or under clothes. My preference is the Amazon. It feels a lot more comfortable. As for washing, both brands wash up nicely and come out of the dryer without wrinkles and ready to wear. Highly recommend.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 27, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great T for layering', 'author': 'Kristine', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Such a great value. The black is a true black. Fit is good. Soft and stretchy. Booth these to layer under a flannel. Works great!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 4, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars completely different form the cotton regular fit', 'author': 'verified customer', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'very sheer, stretchy and tight fitting, V opening is huge. prefer the fit of the regular cotton cut.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 9, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Pleasantly surprised by Amazon Essentials clothing!', 'author': 'Vicky V', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Aside from a pair of summer pajamas for my daughter, I hadn\'t really considered buying Amazon\'s clothing line. In my mind, I was expecting low quality. I was proven wrong in a great way.I ordered a pair of the Slim Fit short sleeve women\'s V-Neck tees in black. I\'ve had some health problems and lost a substantial amount of weight, hence the need for some new shirts. Clothes shopping in person is an exercise in frustration. I have a long torso and equally long arms, so clothes are NEVER the right length. Plus I always feel ripped off- what I purchase NEVER holds up. And I launder CAREFULLY.Imagine my surprise when I tried on the tees, and they were LONG ENOUGH. Length is important! I live and work on a farm, and I NEED my shirts to be long. It prevents hay/feed/wood shavings from getting down the back of my pants. I also have a small market garden, and there is NOTHING more frustrating AND painful than sunburning your lower back because your shirt was too short to keep the sun off while tending crops. These shirts are the FIRST in ages that are ACTUALLY LONG ENOUGH. And I LOVE the slim fit, because they sit close to the body- no snagging them on gates/hooks, safer to wear around machinery. Major points right there.So the shirts fit great, and the fabric is substantial without being too heavy or too light (for me at least). The next concern I had was "How are these going to wash up?" So I washed them inside out in cold water on a regular cycle, and hung them to air dry. After drying, I inspected them carefully. No annoying pinholes, no seams let go, retained shape. Looking even better!Over the past few weeks, I\'ve washed and worn the tees MULTIPLE times a week. They\'re still fitting great, no fading, no weird pinholes, are retaining their shape. And I\'ve worn them in the fields, in the barn for chores, for MANUAL labor. And they\'re incredibly comfortable to boot! So I\'m REALLY starting to like these shirts!One last thing that sold me on these shirts: The last time I laundered both tees, I missed one coming out of the washer and accidentally ran it through the dryer on medium heat. When I realized what I\'d done, I was POSITIVE that the shirt that went through the dryer was going to have shrunk measurably. After the line-dried tee was completely dry, I laid them on top of one another, and compared them. ABSOLUTELY NO CHANGE. Not in size, color, shape, or texture of the fabric. (To be on the safe side, I plan to continue line drying these shirts because I like them so much and want them to last!)Final thoughts:You got me, Amazon. You hooked me in with a 2 pack of tees. I liked them SO much, that last week I ordered a 2 pack of white tees, and a 2 pack of blue/aqua tees. I now have enough shirts to make it through a week of work. And if most of the colors weren\'t sold out right now, I\'d buy more. But I don\'t like the available colors. I\'m really hoping they restock these and keep the cut/fit, because these could easily become my go-to tee.I also see that Amazon has a listing for a slim fit, LONG sleeve tee. It may be summer now, but Wisconsin winter is just around the corner. Those long sleeve tees look like JUST the thing to layer under insulated coveralls and a flannel for winter work. I will be keeping an eye on those, and if they come back in stock, I plan on grabbing a week\'s worth of those too!As always, I will update my review if anything changes with the product. I will probably update my review and note the date that they start to show signs of serious wear/weird holes/seams fail, just so other customers can get an idea of how long these shirts last for someone who\'s using them daily and heavily.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 28, 2021', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great, comfortable basic tees', 'author': 'MTC', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'If you need basic tee shirts for under sweaters, cardigans and just to wear with jeans, these are great. Well made, soft but holds shape well. I even wore one to yoga yesterday and it was perfect love these and plan to buy more.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 14, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Fit!', 'author': 'KG', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I've been looking for T-shirts like these for a long time. The slim-fit allows the shirt to lay nicely along your torso, no matter your size. The fabric is good quality. I washed them and they didn't shrink. And even the white isn't see-through. I will purchase all of the colors I like. I think Amazon Essentials is a very good brand for quality casual clothing. This shirt can also be dressed up. And I like the two-pack same color, especially white. It's a good buy!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 28, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Wow!', 'author': 'Amanda', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Being an Amazon brand t shirt, I wasn’t expecting much. BUT this has got to be the best regular t shirt I’ve ever bought, in store or online. The fabric is soft, breathable and not overly thin or thick — literally perfect. The cut and sizing is spot on, not too tight but well fitted. I’ve bought a lot of regular t shirts from all over, cheap to expensive, and these are the BEST t shirts I’ve EVER bought.Reference: 34” bust, 27” waist,~130lbs', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 16, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Nice t-shirts for price', 'author': 'Gael Allegra', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I bought 2 sets and set(#13) was made in Bangledesh and is softer and silkier feeling than the other set. Not sure if it's the cut of the V neck instead of the split V, but definitely size up! Other than that, I really like the comfort - it's a lightweight long sleeve shirt, which is perfect for me as I usually run hot. I did hang it to dry, just to be sure it wouldn't shrink in the dryer, and it washed up beautifully. Good value, too.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 29, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars 💙 the Color but JMS Runs Smaller in size', 'author': 'TAB J.', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I know that Hanes & JMS Merged together - but I find that JMS runs slightly Smaller in size - 1/2 size smaller. I order 3 shirts Diff Color & in same size. However 2 were JMS & 1 was Hanes. Different fabric feel & textile on 2. However Hanes was more Cotton feel & True to Size then the others. Maybe if there could be a choice on ordering brands I would have Chosen the Hanes!!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 24, 2023', 'is_verified': True}]

title: 5 Pack: Women's Dry Fit Tech Stretch Short-Sleeve Crew Neck Athletic T-Shirt (Available in Plus Size)
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Impressed these shirts actually keep you cooler (and in the heat & humidity of Florida!)', 'author': 'Cheryl E Fitzgerald', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I do like these Real Essentials Dry Fit Women's shirts; they’re not amazing or anything, but for what they are and for the price, they’re nice. They’re comfortable, and they really are cool! I live in Florida, and I have to be outside several times a day to tend to my piggy. I have been delightfully surprised how much cooler these are than any of my regular shirts. And I got all black, by the way.The material is kind of on the thin side and doesn’t have the full opacity of a cotton tshirt. But it’s not sheer or see through; let’s say, it’s opacity is about 90% or something like that. So if you need that full opacity, the black (and maybe other darks?) might be okay; or you might want to just pass on these. (Holding fabric up to the light isn’t at all an accurate test of how it looks being worn, unless you plan on wearing a string of xmas lights underneath…)I’ve been wearing these shirts basically everyday for 5 1/2 months now, and their durability thus far is good. I have not had any issues with seams; nor with holes, snags, or runs. I use a front-loader, but if you use a top-loading washing machine, I suggest either washing on the gentle/delicate cycle, or put them in delicates/lingerie bags, just to be on the safe side, because agitators in top-loaders can be rough on clothes.Regarding sizing, I think this will depend on how you want the shirt to fit. Since so many reviewers said they run small, I first got the large, and it was larger than I was expecting based on the reviews. So I then got the medium, and I have to admit I was surprised it was only a little smaller than the large. The length is fairly similar; the shoulders and body of the medium are narrower by maybe a little less than an inch on each side (laying flat). At some point in the future I will probably get the small too.If you want it to be a little fitted while still being a little loose, then I suggest first just going with your normal size. If you want it to be more loose than fitted, go one size up. If you want it to be more like a classic tshirt fit but without the extra wide shoulders of regular “unisex” tshirts that are really just made for men’s bodies, then go two sizes up.So… is it flattering? Honestly, if this is something you care about, I think this is one of those types of things where you just have to get it and try it on and see how it looks on you. Because on some bodies, it will look nice; but for some people’s bodies, it just won’t work well for them (according to their preferences).Last point: I’m not sure, but they might have bled in the wash (at least the first time anyway), and that was with cold water. If you get dark colors, it’s probably a good idea to take precaution just in case.The material does dry fairly quickly, and it is polyester after all, so dry on low heat, or just hang if you prefer.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 11, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect T for me!', 'author': 'Lisa', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Thank you!! Don\'t change anything. Bought one pack and next day bought another! Good quality, not too thin or too heavy. Love the 90% polyester and 10 spandex, perfect blend for comfort. I\'m 5\'4 136 lbs. with 37" hips. A little busty and leaner waist and carry most of my weight in muscular legs. Size medium is perfect, what I use in bust helps keep from being too long. Could NOT find an even halfway decent tee shirt last 5 years, sooo glad found these 😁', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 20, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars I Had To LOL', 'author': 'Kristine Potter', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'It\'s always interesting when I try to base my purchase decisions by balancing what I Want with Buyer Reviews and Question/Answers. First, I was looking for comfortable shirts. Then I was looking for fit. Then I was looking for thickness. In addition, I was looking specifically for inexpensive, quality shirts that would fit and be comfortable enough for me to SLEEP in.Sheerness first because that\'s what made me laugh. The first shirt I held up (lavender from what\'s currently listed as Set 1) was so sheer that I could see my entire living room through it. However, let me qualify my lol by stating that I was holding it up to a light because I was looking for cosmetic blemishes (I didn\'t find blemishes in any of the 5 shirts). That said, if you\'re going to be out and about during bright daylight, it will be somewhat see through. In addition if it fits you tightly around the bust or middle, it will be see through indoors as well. My concerns about sheerness had mostly to do with the fact that I\'d be braless in them.The fit is always hit or miss. I have to look through a ton of Reviews and Question/Answers before I decide whether to buy a S, M, or L. There were enough comments to convince me I\'d be safest ordering 1 size up for comfort. Even if the shirt turned out to be a bit large on me, that probably would be okay because it wasn\'t something I\'d be wearing out of the house. As long as I can keep the clothing item on my body, loose is most comfortable around the house for me. If I was going to wear these out, I\'d order a medium (I\'m 5\'3" 135lbs mostly pear shaped). I\'m not large-breasted, so I probably wouldn\'t stretch out the shirt enough for my bra to show through it...on a cloudy day.Regarding comfort: I was looking for lightweight, and soft. Some might automatically go for a cotton blend, but I have other shirts of this blend (that are NOT see through), and I find them extremely comfortable to wear and simole to care for. They also don\'t wrinkle. These met my criteria in this category.For the price point when I bought them, it think the overall quality looks pretty good. There weren\'t loose threads on any of the seams or cuffs. In my experience, whether that holds up through laundering will have mostly to do with the quality of thread the manufacturer uses. I keep a simple sewing machine in my utility room, so I can do quick zigzags to help with further unraveling. For this price, I expect one or more of them will end up beneath the needle at some point; although, the thin fabric could deteriorate first.I\'m keeping them for the reasons I bought them, but I won\'t be wearing them without a bra if family or friends stop by for a quick visit. One turn sideways from a lamp, and the transparent silhouette of the girls would make my adult sons uncomfortable. I have cotton blends that will work better for those occasions. I do expect they will be very comfortable to sleep in. If not, I\'ll be back.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 9, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely love it!!', 'author': 'Elizabeth Struck', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Love it!! Sizing runs small but definitely a great price for the quality. Plan on buying many more of the same style of these to be a new wardrobe staple!!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 4, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent.', 'author': 'Kim, Ohio, USA', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Great fit and very comfortable for working out, but, attractive enough to wear with jeans on a casual outing.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 16, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Read the description carefully', 'author': 'Piesgma', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'I was hoping for actual t shirts. You know cotton or cotton blend. These are polyester and spandex. They are true to size and I like the colors. I just like my t shirts cotton. This disappointment was my fault.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 3, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Best all around tee shirts!', 'author': 'Albany gal', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I was pleasantly surprised by these shirts. They are soft and comfortable and wash well. A real bargain. I will purchase them again in the future.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 29, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars WELL MADE/GOOD QUALITY/EXCELLENT FIT', 'author': 'Linda Ledford', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I ordered these shirts for a long staycation In Arizona. My husband ran out of clean T shirts and so I let him wear one of these. He loved these so much that I had to order more! Actually we BOTH love them. I was surprised that these ones fit him better than the ones for men that I had just ordered for him. They look more ‘hip’ on him, with a shorter sleeve and a flared bottom that helps to hide his slight paunch! The color blocking inserts in the side also help with slimming. Also, he says: The material is cool when it’s hot and warm when it’s cold outside. Plus, he loves the fact that his underarms never seem to smell in theses shirts!So, if your guy is looking for something with a little better fit and style, that you can’t get in a ‘regular guy tee,’ order him a set if these! No one will ever know, unless you write a review like I did!Also, these tees are great quality. They launder well with no shrinkage or fading. They fit us true to size and are a great deal for the price. I would highly recommend!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 12, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Duplicate color and STAINED', 'author': 'T. palmer', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'The quality seems nice, I tried on and they fit comfortably and loose! I plan to put a design on it so will update on how it takes that and heat press. But was super upset to not get all the colors! I ended up with TWO pinks instead of the dark green! I was really looking forward to ALL the colors and green is my favorite color so it was an extra bummer.**updating same day- upon FURTHER inspection my orange shirt is STAINED! What the hell. Giving one star. These were clearly used and returned or just complete negligent packaging! So disappointing', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 23, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars They’re ok', 'author': 'Hannah Bouchard', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'For the price they are pretty decent. title: Women's Classic-Fit Short-Sleeve Crewneck T-Shirt, Multipacks
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and classy', 'author': 'Margaret', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I love the fabric and the feel of these tees. They are so comfortable and roomy. Being the plump lady I am - these fit me so nicely and are roomy. They don’t cling, they flow.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 2, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': "5.0 out of 5 stars Great women's shirts, very soft fabric", 'author': 'Prophet-17', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I like these shirts, they're great. Ultra soft, not clingy but fitted, and not too sheer either. Good quality, highly recommend.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 17, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Lots Of Details For You In This Comment!', 'author': 'Songbirdbutler', 'rating': 4, 'content': '"ALL LOVE" ORANGE HEART SHIRT SPECIFICALLY -For anyone interested in the "All Love" orange heart t-shirt, the shirt itself is an off-white/cream color instead of the white as stated & shown in the listing photos. Also, the heart itself is a much darker orange than in listing photos. In fact, in person it is even a little darker than my attached photos.THE T-SHIRTS IN GENERAL - I\'M A FAN.I already have about 8 of these crew & v-neck t-shirts from the last 2 or 3 years in plain white to wear alone or under clothing. I actually like these better than the Gap brand t-shirts I own. They have held up very well despite many, many wearings & washings. I wash & dry them w/ like colors in cold or eco warm water on either the perm press or gentle cycle depending on other items in load. I never noticed any shrinking so if they did shrink some it was minimal. They never wrinkle if hung or folded within a reasonable time after drying. They are very soft on the skin & not too thin or see-through. The fit of this shirt is flattering. They are a little clingy & form fitting on me but it may just b/c I am literally so curvy. I get the XXL which is my normal size but wish they sold a 3XL b/c sometimes I want a looser fit especially in the lighter colors. (Fyi - I am wearing a lounge bra in the photos so it would be more flattering with a proper bra holding my ladies up. It would also help if I stood up straight! Lol.) For reference my measurements are 46-38-56 & b/c of my high waist to hip ratio I am a hard fit. I am right there on the border between regular women\'s tops & plus size tops.LONG-SLEEVE VERSIONS -Everything I said above is referring to the short sleeve versions of these t-shirts. I do have a few of Amazon Essentials\' long-sleeve versions as well. One thing I find weird is that the ones I have bought w/ long-sleeves (white, grey & navy) seem slightly thinner & I find them to be a tighter fit. I don\'t wear any of my long-sleeve ones by themselves b/c I feel self-conscious. While they still feel comfortable on, they cling too tight in my gut & hip area making them unflattering. They make great undershirts, though, under sweaters & stuff. That being said, I recommend going up one size in the long-sleeve version. I wish I could...AMAZON ESSENTIALS\' PLUS SIZES -Yes, Amazon Essentials appears to offer plus sizes in a few of the t-shirt styles but in all the years I have been buying these I have NEVER seen any of the plus size shirts actually be available for purchase. They are always listed as either "out of stock" or just plain "unavailable". Bad luck on my part? Maybe. (Hey Amazon - Is it really that hard to keep these mass produced t-shirts in stock? And why don\'t you offer plus sizes in all or most of your t-shirt styles? The demand is there. Just sayin\'.)', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 7, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy basic', 'author': 'Erin', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Nice basic shirts. title: Women's Slim-Fit Cap-Sleeve Scoop Neck T-Shirt, Pack of 2
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars The BEST shirt EVER', 'author': 'Siobhan', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I am EXTREMELY particular about my shirts and black fitted short sleeve shirts are the most essential part of my wardrobe.I have tried myriads of them over the years, cheap brands, fancy brands, anything in between.This shirt is hands down the BEST.What I look for in my black fitted shirts are flattering slim shape that you can even wear as an elegant piece to dinner with a skirt. Softness of material. Tight in the right places but not too tight around the arms. Doesn’t ride up. Washes well.These shirts meet all the above and more. It’s literally the softest material I have ever had in a shirt. It has the most incredible and comfortable 4 way stretch but preserves its shape perfectly. The material is thick (but breathable and not too hot at all) and extremely high quality. The neckline is beautiful.Amazing job Amazon!! I feel like I have found the love of my life in shirts and I am never letting it go.PS: As an afterthought, company brand clothing items (think Kirkland or Walmart etc.) are usually the cheapest but often the poet quality. Amazon somehow managed to create a line that’s not only cheap but the highest quality was', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 23, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Best t-shirts ever', 'author': 'Probopottomus', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Hands down one of the finest t-shirts I've worn my whole life. Premium material; made of cotton, modal and elastane so it feels as good as it reads. The material is thick and will takes many washes for the fabric to pill. The t-shirt is fitted so it looks flattering and hugs you just the right amount, but because of the modal and elastane, it is not suffocating. It looks good both v-neck and boat neck. The cap sleeve length is just the right length. Good all seasons. I will buy Amazon t-shirts for the rest of my life if you keep this material. Please also make sweatshirts and hoodies of this same quality.The only thing you need to know is that this runs a little larger. The fabric is very forgiving so I would size down if you are in between sizes and if you want a fit that is closer to your silhouette.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 10, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Soft, quality t-shirts - I wish there were more colors', 'author': 'Laura', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'These shirts are great and would be my new staple t-shirt if they came in more colors. reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice T-shirt!', 'author': 'DiJeff', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I just joined the Red Hat Society and was in need of a purple shirt. This totally fit the bill! The material is soft and lightweight. There is a nice stretch and it is not sheer at all (at least the purple is not). I really LOVE the length of the sleeves! I got an X-large (I\'m 5\'4", 164lbs, busty) and the sleeves cover my upper arm flab very nicely! I like that the V-neck is not cut too low. Washes nicely and I love the simple graphic "Be Kind". Will definitely consider more of these!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 18, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars So cute, new favorite t-shirt, already ordered more', 'author': 'Megan', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'After reading the reviews I ordered a deep red "BE KIND" shirt in a large. I usually wear a medium but ordered a size up based on reviews. The shirt was a little large on me, but when tied in a knot like the photos show it was perfect. I wore the shirt all day and received tons of compliments. That evening I ordered a shirt for my mom and two more for myself. This time, I ordered the shirts in a medium. I am wearing one now and it fits perfectly. It is fitted but not tight or clingy in any way. The V-neck hits in a super flattering place. There is no visible cleavage on me. I love the length (I have a long torso and do not have any issues with my belly peaking out) and the fabric. The fabric is thin cotton that feels very high end. It is not see-thru in any way and is not overly stretchy like some of the designer T-shirts I have. It has just enough minimal stretch to allow it to move and flex with your body or to allow you to tie it up if you wish. I now own a large red be kind shirt, a medium red be kind shirt (a gift for my mom), a black faith shirt and a black be kind shirt. If the company continues to release more shirts with messages I like I will continue to buy them.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 22, 2019', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Size Up', 'author': 'Stephanie', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Very cute and quality t-shirt. title: Women's Tops V-Neck Short Sleeve Tshirts Tees Casual Summer Top
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect tee!', 'author': 'Nancy', 'rating': 5, 'content': "This shirt is EVERYTHING, a girl of six feet tall could ask for! For reference, I am six feet tall, weigh 190-180, am a 36DD, and carry my weight in my midsection, and this tee in large, fits me like it was made for me! First I want to talk about the length, I love me a long tee over leggings, it is my comfy day to day, however this tee is elevated just enough that you could toss a cute cardigan over it with a pair of sneaks, and a statement piece of jewelry or hat, and wear it to grab kids from school, run errands, or go to the market. It is long enough that I don't feel self conscious wearing it out of the house with a sweater that covers my backside. Also it is long enough to front tuck, into jeans, or tuck all the way around, and not look super bulky. The v-neck is modest yet sexy, making it appropriate for work on a casual day, or with a blazer paired with a wide leg trouser. My favorite thing, it is so COMFORTABLE! Oh this one would be perfect to lounge in all day, and soft enough to sleep in at night, seriously, just trust me when I say this basic white tee, is not so basic, you need it in your life! Ordering more colors as soon as possible, only recommendation is to the seller, make this in a scoop neck please! As for the rest of you, order this, it is comfortable, able to be dressed up or down, and perfect for all you long torso queens, highly recommend!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 4, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Soft shirt', 'author': 'B P', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'First, I love the color and the softness of this shirt. title: Women's Plus-Size Short Sleeve V-Neck Tee
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Too Short and a bit tight.', 'author': 'CacheKay', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'The shirt is short and very tight fit, I also did not read to get a size up, will order that and see how it goes.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 4, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars no shrinkage after wash and 100% cotton, comfortable', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Reviews were all over about these tops. I still have a couple jms tees that must be 15 years old but are soon to be turned into rags. I wanted a casual tee that is all cotton with sleeves that are not too tight or too short. I have blended tees that fit through the body but the sleeves make my arms look like sausage stuffed into a small casing and they tend to sink into creases. I am 5\'3", 230 lbs, bust measures 47", waist 46 1/2", hips 51". I have broad shoulders and chubby arms. The circumference of the top of my arm measures 16 1/2" and length from top of shoulder to elbow bend is7 1/2". I normally wear a 3x or 2x sometimes. The 2 pictures on the left are the 4x I ordered after reading they run small. It was bigger than I would like and seemed like a true 4x. I washed it in cold water and dried on normal, hoping it would shrink a littles as some had complained they did. It did not shrink at all. I took a chance and ordered 3 in a 3x. hoping the sizing would be accurate. These fit the way I like and those are the 2 pics on the right. The sleeves are not too short or tight., the armholes fit normally and comfortably and the v neck is not too low for me. The cotton is soft. Some complained it is scratchy but mine are not at all. The length goes to the top of my thighs in front and bottom of my butt in back and the scoop hem is very slight as is the cut through the sides. The material does not stick in creases yet is not real thick. They should be comfortable in hot weather. I washed the 3 x\'s in cold water and dried on delicate just to be sure they didn\'t shrink. There was no shrinkage on these either. They all fit the same. I had gotten 2 more in the blue and 1 grey. The stitching and seams are good and the v neckline still laid flat after washing. The pictures posted are after the shirts were washed. You do need to get them out of the dryer right away or I am sure they will wrinkle a lot. Considering some of the reviews, I don\'t know if I just got lucky or if the mfg. has made quality changes but I am very happy with the shirts I got and they are true to my normal size. I wanted a casual shirt for around the house in 100% cotton, running errands or a casual restaurant and these fit the bill for my needs. Some say these fit boxy and I suppose you could say they do since the side dip is not as much as many womens shirts are made but I don\'t want shirts that pull tight across my belly.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 20, 2021', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Great shirt for the price', 'author': 'Muei', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'It seems like it is very difficult to find shirts that cover my butt these days. Many of the shirts in stores are on the short side for my tastes. This shirt fits well and is flattering but it is still a little short. After a few washes (even with hang drying them) the shirts have shrunk and now when I raise my arms my stomach will show. It is a great shirt but I wish they were made longer so that it covers my stomach fully.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 8, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Short', 'author': 'Racheal Ries', 'rating': 3, 'content': "Nice soft material. title: Women's Tech Stretch Short-Sleeve V-Neck T-Shirt (Available in Plus Size), Multipacks
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars I absolutely love this!', 'author': 'Tiara', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I absolutely love the Amazon Essentials Women's Tech Stretch Short-Sleeve V-Neck T-Shirt! The fabric is so comfortable and breathable, perfect for everyday wear or even working out. I especially appreciate that it is available in plus sizes, making it accessible for all body types. The multipack options are a great value and I love having multiple colors to choose from. The fit is true to size and the V-neck style is flattering. Overall, I highly recommend this t-shirt to anyone looking for a versatile and high-quality wardrobe staple. Thank you, Amazon Essentials!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 23, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars great for long torso', 'author': 'Precise Disarray', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This review is for the t-shirts in black and space dye black (primarily gray with black), size 2XL, v-neck.These are long, lightweight t-shirts. Material is a soft blend of polyester and spandex. If you buy your size, the spandex provides a comfortable fitted look with a little compression. I love that it has stretch and come compression. I love a fitted shirt even with my chubs rolls. I am tall (5\'10") with a long torso, so it was AWESOME to try these on and find that they are long enough on me- lower hip, almost to crotch. From shoulder to hem, it measures roughly 27.5". Lays and looks totally natural. ALL of my t-shirts from just about everywhere are too short for my liking. These fit like they should on a tall person, especially those with added length in their torso. SO often I have to wear an extra long tank top under my t-shirts because they are never long enough. For once, I think I can just wear this t-shirt without the added layer if I want. The two colors I chose are not see through, and I would feel comfortable wearing them without a tank top underneath.It feels good, has a quality look and feel, and that makes me feel more put together compared so an ill fitting, misshapen cotton t-shirt that is typically offered in stores. How refreshing! I bought the black and the gray in 2xl, v-neck. I say they are true to size. I\'d say I am a size 20, which corresponds to the size chart for a 2xl in this product. I wouldn\'t want them bigger, and I don\'t think I could go smaller. As soon as I tried them on, I went immediately to my computer to order more. I really want to buy up a bunch more (in same colors and other colors) when they are back in stock.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States April 14, 2019', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars nice and soft', 'author': 'Aline A.', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I\'m 5\'7" and about 118 lbs., with a small bust. title: Women's Slim-Fit Short-Sleeve Crewneck T-Shirt, Pack of 2
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality, nice bright rick colors, soft feel', 'author': 'rsgorman', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'These t-shirts have a very soft mid thickness good quality feel. Colors are rich, not faded. Material is not flimsy or see through. A mid weight t-shirt good for mild to warm weather. Might not be my choice in very hot humid weather. I will buy more of these. I like to use iron on patches to customerize these t-shirts. Ordered a large but it's just too snug around the top.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 10, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Silky soft with a touch of class', 'author': "Amazin' Grandpa", 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Review thoughts on the Evaless Womens Blouse that I shared with my grand daughter. This is blouse is made from a very soft knit fabric with an appearance more of crepe, but without any of the stiffness I typically see in that fabric. The polyester 65%, viscose 30%, and elastane 5% fabric provides a silky soft feel coupled with stretch. The open weave on the shoulders provides a touch of elegance ( my grand daughters words) and will pretty much limit the wearing to warm Texas dawns.The round neck is high and modest.Overall it results in a more dressy look. The Viscose fiber component in the knit fabric provides the silky softness you will love but it also presents a weakness in water. Softening, shrinking, breaking filaments. Because of these traits you will want to use care in wearing and cleaning it. Light wash in cool water and air dry or very low heat tumble will help preserve the blouse so you can enjoy it for a looong time. This top is quite long in the body so it may be worn tucked or untucked as you desire. My granddaughter is about 5\'11" to give you a perspective of size and fit on the Medium size. I was impressed with the quality of workmanship overall. Seams were stitched neatly and with consistent good quality.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 10, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great shirt', 'author': 'Michelle', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I ordered this for days I have to wear professional clothes for presentations in my grad program and it fits great. title: Making Magic Happen Shirt Women Short Sleeve Cute Funny Vacation Tee T-Shirt
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect!', 'author': 'M. Grant', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I typically wear a large but they suggest based on reviews was to get an x-large and it was spot on! The fabric is very soft and I love the style of the sleeves. I can see the fabric washing well. The writing is iron on so I’ll probably was and hang to dry with very little ironing. I wails but again.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 5, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Well made, comfy, fits well, cute', 'author': 'Jennifer D. Kittrell', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This cute t-shirt arrived in a timely manner and was what I expected. The material is super soft and feels nice. I don\'t know the terminology but I think it\'s "silk screening." In other words, the print is IN the fabric, not stuck on. Sizing: I\'m 5\'4", 146 pounds, bust 39", petite proportions. I normally wear a medium or large but, based on the sizing chart, I ordered an XL. It fits perfectly. I think of myself as short-waisted but I\'m probably about average. The bottom hem comes down to just below my front hip bones so I can wear it tucked in or untucked. The shoulders are "slouchy" (??) so there\'s not a seam between the bodice and the arms. That means the fit doesn\'t have to be quite as exact. [I hope that makes sense. You can see it in the pictures.] The fit is right between tapered and loose. [Not quite tapered but not at all boxy.] I find this much more flattering. The sleeves are cuffed and stitched as shown so be aware of that if that\'s not something you like.I would order from this company again. :) [Also, I\'ve washed this three times. It\'s holding up beautifully and is still just as soft. There is no care tag on the garment but I seem to recall the tag that came with it had recommendations for cold water wash, low dry. I\'ve been washing it with a regular load, but hanging to dry. I just prefer to do this with printed t-shirts so they\'ll last longer.]', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 1, 2020', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but runs a smidge small', 'author': 'Jessica', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I got a Large would have liked it a tad larger as I wore with leggings. Size up if you are wanting it to fit loosely.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 7, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Cute shirt', 'author': 'Mackenzie Holcomb', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Fit as described, one of my favorite shirts I wore at Disney.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 21, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfy but not durable', 'author': 'Todd and Mary', 'rating': 3, 'content': "I loved wearing this shirt on our California Adventure day as part of our Disneyland trip. It was comfy and I really like the cuffed sleeve. The length is great and the width worked for me, I am 150 lbs and 5'9''. I ordered a medium. I wore it with black workout pants. It came down under my hips and covered my mommy tummy, but in no way did it cover my tush. Overall very cute however it is not durable. I wore the one day on the trip and when I got home and washed it, the seam on the bottom of the shirt started unraveling. I got it for a lightening deal so I'm not that bummed out. This shirt is cute enough to wear again for future trips, I just didn't think I'd have to repair it after one use.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 24, 2019', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars It fits great and is cute on my daughter', 'author': 'METTE', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'It’s cute could have been a little longer', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 21, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Boutique quality blouse', 'author': 'Littleton', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I am very pleased with this purchase! I ordered two sizes, small and medium as I was unsure of sizing based on reviews. It fits true to size, but if you like your clothing loose, then I would go up one size. I am 5’ 5”, a 32D, size 2 - 4. I typically wear a size small in women’s clothing or medium in junior sizes. My 15 year old daughter is 5’ 6”, a 32 C, size 2 at American Eagle. We both have narrow shoulders which cause some shirts to fall off our shoulders. Both sizes fit us, but we chose the medium for the extra inch in shirt length and room for shrinkage in the event the shirt is accidently put in the dryer. This is NOT a unisex Gildan brand craft T-shirt found at Hobby Lobby or Michaels’. The shirt possibly contains some rayon creating a soft texture and non clingy flow. It is a true gray color, screen printed, not vinyl iron on. The sleeve cuffs are stitched at the top and bottom to hold the cuff in place. This blouse is boutique quality. It will be perfect for our upcoming trip to Disney. I recommend Zawapemia brand to others.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 17, 2018', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and comfortable', 'author': 'Laurenm', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This shirt was adorable for our Disney trip. The loose fit is so comfortable and flattering, and the batwing sleeves add a stylish touch. The solid color is versatile and easy to pair with any bottoms. This casual tee is perfect for everyday wear or can be dressed up for a night out. The quality is fantastic and the material is soft and breathable. I highly recommend this tunic top to any woman looking for a chic and effortless addition to their wardrobe. You won't be disappointed!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 23, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful color!', 'author': 'Afio', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Haven’t worn it yet, however, it seems to be perfect! Very soft, beautiful color, nice weight, I love it', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 5, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but not tunic', 'author': 'Angie Farley Thurman', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'These shirts are cute but they are not tunic length.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 3, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very Comfortable Tee', 'author': 'roriley46', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I ordered several of these Tees in different colors. The color names do not always describe the actual colors of the shirts, but the photos of the colors are more accurate. For instance, the Darkbrown is actually a shade of Pumpkin, but while the name does not match, the color in the photo is more like it actually looks. I ordered a size XXL, which is the correct size per the size chart. The fit is very roomy and loose-fitting. An XL probably could have fit me if I wanted a more fitted look, as there is a nice stretch in the fabric. The fabric keeps its shape nicely even when stretched while putting the garment on, and it falls nicely without wrinkling. The fabric is very light without being “see-through”, and very soft on my skin. I like having a pocket on the shirt front as I have allergies and I use it to keep a tissue handy. The washing instructions say to wash it in warm water, not over 86 degrees F, which is Luke warm. I would not machine dry the garment except to use a cool “air” setting as I would be worried that the fabric may not hold up if it were dried using a warmer setting. The fabric, being so light, dries very quickly if allowed to just air dry. I love the way the fabric feels, that the Tee is roomy, but not sloppy, and that it comes in so many colors. I plan to purchase several more of these Tees in the future.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 6, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Too short for me', 'author': 'Jean Carl', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'Sorry to say I had to regift this top. Soft, nicely fitting t-shirts. I ordered multiple sizes in these shirts for multiple people and they fit as expected, perhaps a LITTLE small. I had pre-washed them and then put iron-on vinyl and tie-dyed them. No major shrinkage in the wash, no fading or bleeding since they've been tie-dyed. title: Womens Summer Tops Casual Country V Neck Tee Shirts Petal Sleeve Fashion Loose Blouse
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great shirt - comfortable', 'author': 'Darlene Garcia', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This is a very nice casual/dressy shirt. To help you with size... I bought a size Medium - I am 5\'1" and weigh 141lbs and my chest is a size 34DDD/36DD. This fits me perfectly. It fits snug but doesn\'t give the line pull between the girls if you know what I mean. I could wear a large so it hangs looser, but then I think it would look a bit baggy. The bottom of the shirt does not cling to your belly, it hangs away so as to hide your belly a little bit. If your belly is a bit bigger, go up a size. The fabric has some stretch to it but not overly stretchy like a t-shirt. It is a comfortable fabric and not itchy at all. I recommend this shirt - I bought several different prints and love them all. I tried to be as descriptive as possible to help you make an informative decision. I hope this helped someone.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 16, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful', 'author': 'Tina B.', 'rating': 5, 'content': "These tops are gorgeous! The pictures don't do them justice. The ombre coloring is just fantastic and the fit is perfect.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 29, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Fits well and beautiful', 'author': 'Rani', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Accurate fitting for medium size and good material.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 23, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Scratchy Material', 'author': 'LJ Wentworth', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'This blouse was a cute style overall, but the material is very scratchy.. I did not like the holes or sheerness of the material. There is another shirt from another Brand:{ ETCYYWomens Summer Casual T-Shirts Ring Hole V Neck Petal Short Sleeve Tops Loose Comfy Tunic Tops} that has a shirt similar to this one that is of different material that is very soft and comfortable. I have 2 blouses from this vendor and will buy another one in a different color', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 27, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty & feminine', 'author': 'Karen J.', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This top is very pretty & comfortable, & can be worn for both casual & dressy. I like the pattern on the fabric & the color looks nice with the crochet v-neck. I ordered it in large & it fit well, but showed my belly a little bit. I then ordered extra large so it would fit looser, but it was too loose & the v-neck was too low. I ended up keeping the large & sending back the extra large.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States May 13, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful & Comy', 'author': 'Catherine', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This shirt is just what I was looking for! Can be dressed up or down. I was very happy with how flattering it was. I am 5\'7" 200 lbs and 40c and ordered the large. It shows off my curves and is not snug at all. It does stretch some but is not restricting. There are some holes in the shirt however it is not enough to be see through. I like to wear tank tops under my shirts however this does not need one. I can wear a purple bra and it does not show. If you\'re in doubt abut purchasing, don\'t be. Super flattering and comfortable!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 11, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Na', 'author': 'Annette J. Long', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Very pretty', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 26, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable', 'author': 'Nightshade', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Very nice as pictured, however size wasn’t great. And I ordered my usual size!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 7, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great top', 'author': 'Theresa Downey', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I really like the color and I typically stay away from blues but i was drawn to this shirt and was not disappointed. It looked sweater like but is not. Very comfy.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 26, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Cute Top', 'author': 'Tracy', 'rating': 4, 'content': "I usually run a small in tops and size 6 overall/pants. I ordered a medium just because I'd rather tops are a little big than too small. With the tulip sleeve, a small probably would have fit perfect but I'm not going to bother returning it. I think it looks better tucked in than out since I have a short torso. The fabric was a bit of a surprise. It's kind of a stretchy jersey, Pointelle type material. Didn't realize it was all polyester. I probably would have given it 5 stars if the fabric had been more of a cotton, t-shirt type fabric without the tiny holes (Pointelle) all over it. Overall, I think it's a really cute, unique top, though. Also, the neckline cuts a little lower than I like, but it can easily be adjusted with a string or ribbon by threading a couple of those lower grommets at the neckline.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 27, 2023', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Women Oversized T-Shirt Summer Casual Short Sleeve Loose Tee Tops
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I was looking for', 'author': 'Jenny L', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I\'m super happy with this tshirt! It\'s soft and drapey and a nice medium weight fabric - not sheer at all. The color is heathered but still vibrant. The style is meant to be a little boxy, so while it\'s oversized in the sleeves and width, it\'s not especially long (hits me about halfway down my derriere). That\'s exactly what I wanted, but if you\'re looking for a longer shirt this might not be it. I\'m a French tuck girlie and a high waist girlie, so always looking for tees that fold/tuck and sit nicely, which this one does.I\'m 5\'8" for reference, about 32-30-42 (plus a substantial cup size). I had also order an XL but that veered too far into baggy. Kept the Large. I think this checks all the boxes for the perfect casual oversized tshirt and will be ordering more colors for sure.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 23, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars I’m at that age. Hello 40!!', 'author': 'MJ', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This comfy oversized T-shirt has quickly become my wardrobe essential, and I couldn’t resist getting it in three different colors. As they say, when you find something that fits perfectly and feels incredibly comfortable, you just have to stock up! The moment I slipped into this T-shirt, I knew it was a game-changer. The oversized fit gives it a relaxed and effortless vibe that’s perfect for casual days or even just lounging around. The fabric is incredibly soft against my skin, and the quality is evident in every detail. I appreciate how it provides the right amount of coverage while still maintaining a stylish look. It’s versatile enough to pair with jeans, leggings, or even as a beach cover-up. The best part? It’s that ideal piece to throw on when you’re not in the mood for fussing over your outfit, yet you still want to feel put together. With the convenience of having it in three different colors, I’ve found my go-to solution for those days when I want to feel comfortable and confident without sacrificing style. If you’re looking for a versatile and comfy wardrobe staple, this oversized T-shirt is the answer – and don’t be surprised if you end up owning it in multiple colors too!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 26, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Great shirt', 'author': 'Cheryl Natividad', 'rating': 4, 'content': "Nice, lightweight shirt, great quality. The dark grey color is exactly what I wanted. The fabric is thin and soft, but not see through. I bought an XL because I wanted something loose and drapey, and this is exactly that. It's big enough that I could probably go down a size and it still would be a loose fit. It's just barely long enough to cover my butt, which is fine. 4 stars only because the care instructions are confusing. Drying instructions on the tag says tumble dry low or line dry; instructions on Amazon show line dry. I know rayon usually shrinks in the dryer, so I'll probably line dry it. I like it enough that I'll buy other colors.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 13, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft fabric and great fit!', 'author': 'M.L.', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I'm currently 33 weeks pregnant and bought two of these for post partum! They actually fit great now and are still loose on my big belly! The material is so soft and the drop sleeves are flattering. Definitely will be buying this in more colors!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 20, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable', 'author': 'Caroline Clowes', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'The material is very nice and lightweight. It does run large. I usually wear large to extra large and I ordered a medium. It fits and is roomy. The reason for 3 stars is the length. Barely covers my bottom. Was much longer in the picture. 5’2 and 170.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 28, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Loose fit', 'author': 'cynthia', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Great tops! Loose fit which I love!I own 7 so far.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 27, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect', 'author': 'Tasha Castillo', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'The design of these shirts and the material make them really attractive. You can dress them up or wear them casually it’s comfortable like a T-shirt but the cut makes it a little more dressy and it’s made out of good quality fabric. I got mine a little big, because I like a roomy fit, but I think I could order down a size next time and be just as happy', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 8, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Gonna get more!', 'author': 'yellowith_nv', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Light, comfy, not see through. Perfectly oversized. I’m normally a L/XL, but I ordered a M.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 15, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Very oversize and boxy and not white', 'author': 'BMR', 'rating': 4, 'content': "First the color, I ordered white and it is more ecru or cream than white. If you are looking for a pure white shirt, this is not the one for you. That said, the style says oversize and indeed it is. It is very large, but also boxy. I don't typically tuck shirts in, but I may have to on this one to give it shape. I think it will be fine for traveling and lounge, but not for much else. I wish I would have returned.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 13, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Comfy but not the best value', 'author': 'Nayda Ro', 'rating': 4, 'content': "I have had this in my cart for a long time and finally bit the bullet. When it finally arrived, I was super excited. The fabric is EXTREMELY soft. A very good quality fabric. It just wasn't as flattering on me as I had hoped and for how much I spent, I couldn't justify keeping it. I ultimately returned it but would definitely recommend it to folks who are more fashion-forward and know how to style a t-shirt!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 5, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Classy and comfortable', 'author': 'Betsy', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Very nice looking shirt that is comfortable. Very Cool and comfortable..', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 18, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and pretty, true to size', 'author': 'Matt B', 'rating': 4, 'content': "XIEERDUO Lace Puff Sleeve Tops for Women 2024 V Neck Shirts Woman's Shirts Dressy Casual Loose Tops Summer Tee ShirtThe blouse comes economically packaged shrink-wrapped in a sealed plastic bag with a zip-top closure. I like it when manufacturers shift clothing vacuum shrink-wrapped because that saves space in shipping and it puts the product to your door, clean and pristine. After you cut the top of the plastic bag, it slides off to expose the interior bagged shirt. The shirt is packaged with a hanging tag that says do not bleach, iron on low heat, tumble dry low, and machine wash and cool water, 30°C (or 86F), and the garment tag on the interior of the shirt has similar washing instructions, along with the extra caveat to wash dark colors separately. According to the garment tag, this shirt is constructed of 95% polyester and 5% spandex. With the spandex in the mix of the fabric, the fabric has a little bit of stretch to it. The stretchiness on this fabric goes left and right, but not up and down. The design on the fabric is printed cleanly and in a very pretty pattern. The shirt's interior is plain white fabric, the back of the painted section. The sleeves are made of a different material that is manufactured to be in a faux lace style. The outer edges of the sleeve are scalloped and designed with half rosettes. The top of the sleeve in the shoulder area is cut so that it puckers and gives a little bit of angle to allow better movement and to make the design a little more feminine. When wearing the shirt, the effect of the sleeve cut gives it kind of a squared-off shoulder appearance. The neckline is folded over and sewn similarly to the hemline on the bottom. It's a gentle v-neck cut to the neckline. The fabric and the main portion of the shirt are soft and comfortable, but the faux lace shoulders/ sleeves have no stretch to them and feel like starched linen against the skin. The sleeves are a light peach color that matches the design of the shirt well. On a 5'4 woman, the blouse comes down below the hips. We ordered large as that is her normal size. It is a comfortable fit, true to size, and not baggy or overly tight. If you happen to have larger arms, this may not be as comfortable because the faux lace does not stretch or give.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 25, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': "5.0 out of 5 stars St Patrick's Day Special", 'author': 'Old Grey Mare', 'rating': 5, 'content': "The Green Four Leaf Clover XIEERDUO Lace Puff Sleeve Top will quickly become my go-to top for celebrating St Patrick's Day and currently is advertised at a very low price.The sleeves are made with scalloped eyelet fabric that isn't the best color match for the top. The top is made from 95% polyester and 5% spandex giving the top enough stretch to easily get the top on and off. I wear a size 18 and the XX-Large fits just right to allow the top to gently drape off of my body and fall just below my hips.It's advised to wash this top with other dark clothes but my first wash it will be washed separately and I'll toss in one of those color-catching sheets to see if the colors bleed. title: Basic T Shirt for Women Casual V Neck Short Sleeve Tee Shirts Solid Loose Summer Tops
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely Casual V-Neck Short Sleeve Shirt', 'author': 'Mad Marigan', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I'm 5'8 and 156 lbs. I ordered the FOWSMON casual v-neck short-sleeve shirt in a size L and the color Blue.I love this shirt. The material is thick and has held up to many washes, meaning no thinning or pilling. I have a toddler, so I'm constantly squatting down to his level. The v-neck is perfect for letting me have a little more skin showing without my chest being on display. The material is so comfortable, and the heather blue is a beautiful shade, though not as heathered as it looks in the picture. (This isn't a negative for me: I love the color of the shirt.) The shirt is a little more tailored through the lower waist, but not so much that it is too tight or makes me self-conscious. I have broader shoulders, and the design of this shirt doesn't hug my shoulders or arms like a lot of shirts do on me. The small cuff on each sleeve is a perfect little touch to make it not a flat, plain shirt.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 5, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Color off but VERY comfortable', 'author': 'K. Berg', 'rating': 4, 'content': "I could easily wear this to work with a blazer and it would be business casual. I have worn it to bed and also out to eat. Lots of versatility. It's not cotton but rather a stretch poly blend. Almost silky.The one drawback was that I thought this was going to be closer to Army Green. It is, what I would call, Pine Green. Like the crayon. Still a good color but not the one I prefer.I would definitely recommend this shirt. It is SO comfortable.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 23, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and Comfy', 'author': 'M. Smith', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This top is cute and comfortable. The fabric is soft and holds up well in the wash. It is a bit long, but that makes it the perfect lounge-around-the-house shirt for me!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 4, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Very true to size', 'author': 'Stephanie D', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'If you want a baggier look to be able to tuck in a little (as we all do now a days) size up!
