title: Plus Size Tops for Women Short Sleeve Shirt Summer Star/Leopard/Tie Dye/Flower Crewneck Pullover Tunic XL-5XL
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Love these tops!', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Great fit, soft material & love the colors.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 23, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars My very picky mom loves it!', 'author': '245Trioxin', 'rating': 5, 'content': "It's so hard to buy gifts for my mom, she always has an excuse not to like something (particularly clothes) which is always a good gift to get her, because you can never have too many shirts.It's always the wrong material or the wrong size or this or that, but I took a chance.As her son, I took a guess on size based on other shirts she wears. I'm not giving her weight (I don't know it) but she is plus sized and I think 5'6 or 5'7.My mom also loves wearing oversized shirts. Not ridiculously oversized, but for comfort. I bought the pink and black (because I love the band Twisted Sister) and that's a color theme they often used and one I've always liked. I know my mom loves those colors too though, and she doesn't have a black AND pink shirt.I got her the 3x, but I know she's probably between a 1x or 2x. She's not swimming in it. She loves how it fits. The colors are accurately represented (which is rare when buying online) and personally, I think she looks great in it!She didn't want me to take a photo of her, but I've seen her wear it several times, and that to me is all I need to know.I bought it as a gift so I can't say too much, but I would have to say that it's comfortable, lightweight and good looking if my mom frequently wears it.Two thumbs up!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 21, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Very soft and comfortable even with the lace sleeves', 'author': 'Gal in Cal', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I love the look of lace but it tends to be itchy and uncomfortable to me. In this shirts case it\'s not at all. The entire shirt is very soft and comfortable.I got the XL (45.38 bust per the size chart) I would say it fits pretty spot on. reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this top!', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This top is absolutely darling! Between the surgery and my autoimmune disease that is inflammatory; my body is super angry and not in the shape I was getting after a previous 100# weight gain with prednisone. title: Women's V Neck T Shirts Half Sleeve Tops Casual Solid Summer Tees
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Quality', 'author': 'Brenda Plowman', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Great fit. Even though the shirt has sleeves, the fabric is really cooling and I did not feel hot wearing it.The shirt fits well and true to size. I got a large, and it fits perfectly plus gives me a looser fit, which is usually what I prefer. If you do like something even more looser than I would suggest sizing up.It’s a really plain t-shirt that I think is versatile and would look flattering on any body type. It’s also one of those shirts that can pair nicely with jeans, shorts or my favorite, leggings!Overall, I would recommend it to others looking for a stylish, comfortable tee.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 31, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and I love the sleeve length.', 'author': 'Gryffindork', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Ticticmiss women\'s V-neck shirt. The V-neck is slightly big due to the size on me but that\'s not an issue with this shirt since I\'ll be wearing it mostly for running amok in my home and yard. I would recommend this shirt for the comfort factor and the sleeve length if you prefer a longer short sleeve like I do.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 27, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Loving the sleeve length, so versatile', 'author': 'Sz', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I’m really a fan of this t-shirt! reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable, well-made, basic mixed-fabric t-shirt!', 'author': 'TM', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I'm happy with this reliably fitting, well-made, basic mixed-fabric t-shirt! title: Women's Mesh Plunge Bra
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Controls cleavage!', 'author': 'Rakadax', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Nice lightly padded bra with good color & print choices at an affordable price! The variety of sizes is appreciated as well. I ordered my usual size of 32DD, the cup size is right but the band is on the snug side even on the last hooks. I will definitely try again with a 34DD. I do have to adjust the inner padding underneath the mesh when first putting on to make sure I have full coverage! Otherwise it does a great job of holding in my big natural breasts & does minimize their size! It still gives you minimal controlled cleavage without major bulging in the neckline where I have to periodically tuck them back in. The line between padding & mesh is minimal & works under a tee. I bought the black leopard print because it was a great price! Will definitely order again in a different size, whatever colors are marked down!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 4, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and durable', 'author': 'Milan Kalra', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I liked the bra, didn’t expect wired bra, could have read the description, hahaha, but it’s definitely a good purchase and wore it 2-3 times already, it’s comfortable and not annoyed by the wire', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 20, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price', 'author': 'csj565', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'This bra (for me) was relatively comfortable and supportive. My washer broke and I wore it several times before washing. It held up well. It\'s also very cute, some might say sexy! I lost alot of weight so expected to not need to hook on last row but not the case so it may run a little small but the D cup was perfect. Also, I LOVE "Try before you buy!"', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 2, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Nice Bra but sizing off', 'author': 'Beth36', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'I ordered 40 DD. I took a chance since it was on sale but the sizing is off and I don’t know what size to try next. I always wear a 38 or 40 DD. I love the feel and shape of this bra, there is no thick padding, I wanted it to work so bad but the very center part does not lay flush against the skin, It literally fits perfect everywhere else so I don’t think going a bigger cup size would work.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 20, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Pleased with purchase', 'author': 'Tammy Smith', 'rating': 5, 'content': "The item FITS!!! There's none of the new wretched things that companies are doing with bras these days. The hooks and loops are on the correct side. There aren't FOUR hooks like on another garment I purchased recently. WHO DOES THAT???? It fits appropriately. Despite the little bit of aesthetic lacing, it doesn't make me itch!!! Arrived on time. Great quality. Would purchase again.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 23, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars True to size', 'author': 'PeriElen', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Full coverage, sexy and sturdy for bugger bust.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 20, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '2.0 out of 5 stars Underwire poked through!', 'author': 'Discriminating Buyer', 'rating': 2, 'content': "UPDATEThe underwire poked through in two of these bras, so disappointed. They poked through in the middle, I tried sewing one back in but it poked through the fabric again, seems like I would have to stitch on a piece of fabric over it to make sure it doesn't poke through. I can only say I've never had a bra for such a short time where the underwire poked through!I bought this in the 36 size but the center didn't fit against my chest, but there's no E or F size but the bra was comfortable. Bought it in 38 and the center still doesn't fit against my chest and the band is a little looser but it can be worn. Compared to my usual Bali bra where I bought a 38G to try, this is heaven! The Bali I bought was so tight it was unbelievable, it was like it was a size 30 band instead. The cups dug into my armpits and the center still didn't fit against my chest and there were puckers in the cups. Of late Bali bras seem to be getting smaller band wise so this might be my new bra brand if I can get it in bigger cup sizes.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 26, 2022', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Quality is ok for the price.', 'author': 'Connie Long', 'rating': 4, 'content': "The shape and fit are good. It's very hard to find unlined bras without lace on the cups, so these are good. The fabric is a little stiff with a few wrinkles, but ok for the price.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 4, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Great everyday bra but....', 'author': 'M. McDougall', 'rating': 4, 'content': "This works as a great everyday bra. No itching from lace, so far no poking from wires. The only con is that the fabric under the light mesh (cup part) does not lie perfectly smooth. Perhaps my cup doesn't runneth over and totally fill the space but if you look at some of the pics of other women, I'm not the only one who sees this issue. Would I wear it with a tight fitting top, probably not. I'd look for something with a smoother finish.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 5, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Cute!', 'author': 'Amanda Warwick', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Really cute and pretty comfortable as far as bras go. I was a little surprised by how much of the “sheer” material there is, but maybe that’s my fault for not looking closely enough. Just be advised that if you were to wear this bra with an average tank top, the sheer part may show!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 21, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Plus Size Tops for Women Short Sleeve Shirt Summer Star/Leopard/Tie Dye/Flower Crewneck Pullover Tunic XL-5XL
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Love these tops!', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Great fit, soft material & love the colors.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 23, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars My very picky mom loves it!', 'author': '245Trioxin', 'rating': 5, 'content': "It's so hard to buy gifts for my mom, she always has an excuse not to like something (particularly clothes) which is always a good gift to get her, because you can never have too many shirts.It's always the wrong material or the wrong size or this or that, but I took a chance.As her son, I took a guess on size based on other shirts she wears. I'm not giving her weight (I don't know it) but she is plus sized and I think 5'6 or 5'7.My mom also loves wearing oversized shirts. Not ridiculously oversized, but for comfort. I bought the pink and black (because I love the band Twisted Sister) and that's a color theme they often used and one I've always liked. I know my mom loves those colors too though, and she doesn't have a black AND pink shirt.I got her the 3x, but I know she's probably between a 1x or 2x. She's not swimming in it. She loves how it fits. The colors are accurately represented (which is rare when buying online) and personally, I think she looks great in it!She didn't want me to take a photo of her, but I've seen her wear it several times, and that to me is all I need to know.I bought it as a gift so I can't say too much, but I would have to say that it's comfortable, lightweight and good looking if my mom frequently wears it.Two thumbs up!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 21, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Very soft and comfortable even with the lace sleeves', 'author': 'Gal in Cal', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I love the look of lace but it tends to be itchy and uncomfortable to me. Flattering. Great color.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 29, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Cute shirt to fit a theme', 'author': 'Kas', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I got this shirt because I\'ve suffered chronic illness with a lot of ups and downs over the last 2 years. People always comment or ask how I\'m so positive considering what has happened to me and my health at my young age. I don\'t know how I stay positive. I\'m not always positive, but I try not to complain because it does nobody any good. Yes, I\'ve cried, screamed, thrown things. I\'ve wished and begged things to be better or never to have happened the way it did. But I still face the world with a smile and take things day by day. I figure I\'m on borrowed time considering my due date came and went. I\'ll try to enjoy what leftovers I get.Long story short, a going joke is that my life theme lately has been something along the lines of, "I\'m okay, alright, fine. I\'m all good. Everything is great." As if I\'m chanting it in the mirror every morning before tackling my day. With that in mind, I came across this shirt a couple weeks before a trip to a hospital further away with more knowledge about my situation and knew I had to order it. I wore it the day I went to the hospital for all the tests and evaluations. Made a few medical staff giggle about how appropriate the shirt was. It felt so very me, and it brought a smile on multiple people\'s faces, including my own. If I could have this shirt in multiple different colors I probably would. Even if that\'s the only time i got to wear it, it will have been worth it. That being said, it\'s in my closet washed and ready for another outing. I\'m saving it for a rainy day to remind myself that I\'m okay, and everything will be okay.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 11, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Year-Round Comfort: Comfy and Versatile Shirt', 'author': 'Cece', 'rating': 5, 'content': "This shirt has become a favorite in my wardrobe. Its relaxed fit provides comfort, and I've found a clever way to make it suitable for both winter and summer. Wearing a black long-sleeve undershirt during the colder months, I can easily transition to a comfy and cute summer look by removing the extra layer. I opted for a size larger to ensure a loose and comfortable fit. Highly recommend!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 3, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars So soft and comfortable', 'author': 'Karen Royal', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This top is exactly like the photo in color and fit. I just washed it and was crossing my fingers it wouldn’t shrink and it didn’t. I’m going to order more', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 29, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars BASIC BUT VERSATILE', 'author': 'Clark Imaginations, LLC', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Great alternative to wearing my husband’s tees, more feminine but just as comfortable - if not more. 😉 Great basic top, very soft & extremely comfortable. title: Women's Tops V Neck Ruffle Puff Sleeve Summer Fashion Casual Loose Fit T Shirts
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this top!', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This top is absolutely darling! Looks every bit as amazing in person as it does on the model. The color is pretty true to what is seen on the model as well. I ordered two colors. The first color is a beautiful vibrant peachy pink color and the other is a very lovely shade of grey (it’s not a dull bland grey at all), both colors are beautiful! The semi puff/balloon sleeve with the ruffle edge gives this t-shirt top a little extra flair taking it up a notch. The elastic gathering is the perfect amount of cinch, I have larger upper arms so it’s not tight at all, and is very comfortable on the arm. The material is not too thin yet light enough and “breathable” making it great to wear even in the Florida heat. The material is also very soft and feels wonderful on the skin making it a top that can be worn all day and into the evening. I purchased a size XL and it fits wonderfully, it’s not tight but has a little flow to it. I like that the top is longer in length giving options to wear as it or tuck it in, as well as it’s long enough that if you want to cover your bum you can. For size reference I am 5’4” my weight fluctuates from 180-200 pounds, currently I am 189 but I know this will still fit just as nicely at 200 pounds. Bra size varies depending on brand but ranges from 34-36 DDD/F/G. No matter your size and height I think you will love this top as much as I do!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 29, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft', 'author': 'Marleynna', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Love thus style.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 28, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Great fit', 'author': 'lisa sladek', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'True to size and very flattering.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 19, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very Comfortable & perfect fit.. Besides being in the Alt/Goth/Punk scenes, skulls and skeletons have always been my aesthetic. I grew up watching horror movies with my Dad and medical and crime shows with my Mom, so skeletons/skulls have always held a special place in my heart...I enjoy them for the memories and not to be "edgy."This skeleton shirt is definitely an oversized shirt...so if you want more of a tighter fit, definitely order a size or 2 down. I would have sized down, but my chains and harnesses fits perfectly around the image like a frame, so I\'ll deal with the extra room so as not risking covering up any part of this gorgeous image. The material is very comfortable and soft and the image is beautifully done (no blurring, no smearing, and no cracking so far when the shirt is stretched.I would definitely recommend this Skeleton on a swing shirt to anyone. I absolutely love the gorgeous image of the carefree skeleton just swinging away in the moonlight, the soft and comfortable shirt fabric, and the overall great quality of this shirt.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 4, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable', 'author': 'Nicole O', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'This is a very comfortable basic t-shirt. I liked the design (though I thought it was a different design, less fem, but that’s on me.) and I liked that it came in larger sizes. While I can get by on a large or XL depending on the brands, I hate clingy clothing, and I hate anything rough. I was very happy to see it meets my criteria.The material is pretty soft–not as soft as some shirts, certainly, but softer than most shirts you will find at department stores. The design is sturdy and I don’t think it will crack for a long time, if the shirt is properly cared for. While the design is more feminine than I like, it IS very pretty.The shirt fits just like I wanted, loose enough to be comfortable without being so oversized I look like I’m wearing a dress. The lower neckline means I don’t feel like I’m choking, and the sleeves don’t crush up under my arms.This is a really great value, and I would definitely buy this brand and fit again!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 7, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality and Value', 'author': 'Kellibelli1126', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I really like this t-shirt! They add a playful touch to my outfits while keeping me cool and comfy in the summer heat.If you're looking for the perfect blend of comfort and style in an oversized tee with eye-catching graphics, these Women's Oversized T-shirt Graphic Tees are a must-have. I highly recommend them for a laid-back and trendy wardrobe staple!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 22, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars BEST COMFY SHIRT EVER', 'author': 'Alexandria Byers', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This shirt is basically everything I look for in a comfy shirt for lounging, errands, etc. I ordered a small and both me and the eldest child can both wear it. It fits like a normal t-shirt on me, but such a cute oversized shirt on her. It\'s stretchy as all get out - the material very much reminds me of bamboo. I also noticed that when it gets stretched, the graphic does not crack!!! I\'ve washed the shirt about 5 times since receiving and have experienced no fading of the color of the shirt or the graphic. This shirt has a good length, so it avoids that boxy look. Besides being in the Alt/Goth/Punk scenes, skulls and skeletons have always been my aesthetic. I grew up watching horror movies with my Dad and medical and crime shows with my Mom, so skeletons/skulls have always held a special place in my heart...I enjoy them for the memories and not to be "edgy."This skeleton shirt is definitely an oversized shirt...so if you want more of a tighter fit, definitely order a size or 2 down. I would have sized down, but my chains and harnesses fits perfectly around the image like a frame, so I\'ll deal with the extra room so as not risking covering up any part of this gorgeous image. reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very Cute and Summery-but not all colors look in person as they look online.', 'author': 'FizzySmile', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I ordered roughly 6 of these and am only sending back 2.I ordered extra large, as I am quite busty and I wanted a looser fit for summer. I am keeping that one though.The tie dye blue green-the green was a little too neon/lime for me. That was sent back.Colorful Lines: This is so so pretty in the picture but the white background is more cream and overall had a yellow hue. This sort of dimmed the colors. That was also sent back.The colors that I ordered that I felt were represented well in photos were: Blue Lilium, Ink Blue and Colorful Tie Dye.Overall, very happy with my purchases. title: Women's Casual V Neck Half Sleeve Shirts Ribbed Knit Solid T Shirts Tops
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Slenderizing - hangs nicely', 'author': 'LeAnne', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This t-shirt is an interesting polyester blend with sleeve cuffs and subtle vertical ribbing that gives it a slenderizing look. The cloth is thin but has a weight to it that helps it drape nicely.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 23, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Runs small!', 'author': 'Jo Baughan', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'As a seventy-year-old, I like elbow-length sleeves. If the top had fit, I would have bought multiples. I am bosomy with thick arms. This top will never see the light of day with me. If you are younger, it may work for you. I am not a fan of the deeply ribbed material. If you want a form-fitting top, you are in luck. Otherwise, forget it!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 9, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars So cute', 'author': 'LunchLady', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I love this top. Pay attention to the size chart. I ordered a size bigger than I usually wear based on the size chart and am glad I did. The bigger size fits really well and is such a flattering top. I got the light blue and I love the color. This shirt is very light weight and comfortable. I got so many compliments wearing this. I like the cuff on the sleeve. I think it gives it a dressier feel and I really like that. This top really exceeded my expectations and for the price, it is a great value. I am going to order another in a different color!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 12, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and Attractive', 'author': 'Woodland Wanderer', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I got the JUSTFASHIONNOW Women\'s Casual V Neck Half Sleeve Shirts Ribbed Knit Solid T Shirt recently and absolutely love it! Living in eastern NC, we have extended seasons with warmer temps than some places. This shirt is a great addition to the closet for changing seasons, but it is good in heat as well. I wore it twice in pretty high temperatures so far (outdoor events at 90+ degrees F) and was as comfortable as those temperatures and bugs would allow.One thing I noticed was that the shirt doesn\'t show sweat easily. One day I was helping photograph a quinceañera cerebration. It was HOT and I was on my feet moving around a lot. I got a light colored shirt and as the sweat poured off me I was sure the shirt would show it. Much to my delight, I looked cool and comfortable despite the sweat below.The shirt is comfortable and the design is attractive. I got the size Large based on the dimensions and previous experience with the way most of these are sized more European. For reference, I wear a size 10/12 usually, or size Medium US size, weigh 175-lbs give or take a few, have a 36C chest and size 32-34" waist. It fits perfectly.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 7, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars It’s Mine, now! 😁', 'author': 'BirdNerd', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I got this basic black shirt for my daughters, but the sleeves are not a “cool” length, so that’s fine with me, because we are all the same size and I adore 3/4 length sleeves!I could’ve gone with a small, but the medium is comfortable. I knew that was probably true, but I tend to stick with mediums to be safe.The fabric is lovely. It’s a flattering, casual black top that’s good to wear anywhere!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 13, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and soft material but runs a little small', 'author': 'Genevieve', 'rating': 4, 'content': "Lightweight and soft material that is not see-through and seems durable. The laundry instructions say handwash and hang dry. I haven't washed it yet. I took off a star because the shirt runs a little small. According to the size chart it should fit but it is really form fitting in the boob area. I may try to wear a minimizer bra when I wear it. The shoulders and length were good and fit as expected.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 29, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, comfortable, and flattering!', 'author': 'Reviewer Dr. Beth', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I ordered this top for 2 reasons: 1) I loved the half (elbow) sleeves, and 2) I wanted something in gray. The gray color is very light, more of a silver and light enough to look almost white in the photos (it\'s definitely a light gray than how it appears in the item description). I was pleasantly surprised by how soft the shirt is! It\'s a knit with an attractive wide horizontal ribbing and a bit of stretch. I am usually right between a small and medium in most tops. I decided to go with a medium for this based on the sizing charts. Overall I think it was the right choice, as the sleeves probably would have been too tight in the small, but I would have liked it it to be slightly less baggy. (For reference, I\'m 36B, 5\'4.5", about 150 lbs.) At first, seemed like it might be a bit tight in the sleeves, but when I put it on, the sleeves were as comfortable as the rest of the shirt. I liked the length, which hit about mid-hip for me, and I LOVED the half sleeves, perfect for the weather starting to get cooler. I also find the v-neck to be very flattering. I would wear this shirt for work or for casual - very happy I ordered this!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 14, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Sweater Shirt', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': "This came in very nicely folded and package. This sweater t-shirt looks just like it is pictured here. I ordered the light grey color. It is a v-neck. I usually wear a size L and this fits well. The sleeves are about to my elbows and are cuffed which adds to make it a bit cuter. The material is very nice and good quality. It will be a great addition to my fall/winter wardrobe. The material is 8% spandex, 31% viscose and 61% polyester. I do like that the material does have a little stretch and give to it. It is a little bit thicker material than a normal cotton t-shirt. I think this shirt can have many uses from dressed up to casual and I definitely think this could be worn to work. I think it's a bit too thick to wear during the summer in the South. I definitely recommend this cute v neck shirt!!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 2, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Loose Fit Style', 'author': 'Melissa Anderson', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'The tops is soft and comfy. The white is not bright white and not see through. For reference, I’m 5’6 and 150lbs and usually wear size M…The tops fir me perfectly, but it’s a loose fit style. If you want a tight fit, I recommend size down a size.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 2, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars why not an extra small', 'author': 'Lee4kids', 'rating': 4, 'content': "i never understand why there isn't an extra small option for some clothes, there really is a difference btw small and extra small and as cute as this shirt is an extra small would fit so much better, great cut, very soft and lightweight and i love the fabric, can be dressed up or down, again just wish it was smaller because the small prob fits sizes 4-6 and i am a bit smaller on top", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 1, 2023', 'is_verified': False}]

title: Women's V Neck T Shirts Casual Rolled Short Sleeve Side Split Summer Tops Loose Fit
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars MY NEW FAVORITE (updated)', 'author': 'CallMeE', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'UPDATE: I\'ve had several of these shirts for about a year now. I always wash in cold water & hang to dry. They\'ve held up well, although they are beginning to pill slightly. This is most apparent in the "Lake Green" color (which is really more of an ice blue). I use mostly the tide "free and clear" detergent; maybe I would have had less pilling w/woolite- I don\'t know. In any case, considering that I wear these shirts a LOT, and their low price, I don\'t mind replacing every year or two, and have just invested in a new stash. A note on sizing: the heathered peach color runs a LOT bigger than the others I bought (which were non-heathered colors), to the point that the XL looks sloppy on me. I don\'t know whether this is true of all the heathered colors, or whether the one I have is just a fluke. I can attest that the white is not see through at all. (there are 2 whites- I got the one w/the raglan sleeve) All in all, still my favorite, and still the most-worn shirts in my wardrobe // LOVE this shirt! Very flattering- The V-neck is low enough to show just a peek of cleavage w/out being "too much. The slits at the side add a nice touch. Great fabric, nice weight- thin enough to be flattering w/out feeling flimsy. I ordered the ice blue color which is really cute and not see-through. (Don\'t know about the white yet- I have that on order & will report back). The raglan sleeve is also cute & means that if you are large busted like I am, you can get a size that\'s large enough w/out having to worry that the shoulder seams will be too low. I can usually wear a "large" in shirts that are loose-fitting. This time, I originally ordered a large and it was TINY and very clingy. The XL is just right. So I\'d advise that if you are looking for a relaxed fit as shown on the models, definitely size up, especially if you\'re busty or have a body that is over 40+. Haven\'t washed it yet- will report when I do. I wish it was made in the USA (and would even be happy to pay a little more for a shirt that was). Other than that, it\'s perfect.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 22, 2021', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Comfort and fit', 'author': 'Jennifer coleman', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Really like. Size as expected, comfortable and cute.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 4, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars VERY NICE BUT RUN LARGE', 'author': 'BJ Presscott', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'These shirts have held up to many washes. They are well made, look nice but run a little big. I am 6’3 and weigh between 115 and 118. I usually buy mediums as I like a loose fit for comfort. These fit a bit more like a large. They don’t look bad, but are definitely “loose fitting”. Colors and fabric are nice.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 17, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Good style but low quality', 'author': 'L. Borja', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'The material is very stretch which would help to make it more comfortable to move around. However it is a shiny material which makes it look cheap. I would give quality a 2 star rating. A t-shirt bra will definitely be needed as the material and finish make every bit of texture super noticeable.The sizing is not as shown in the listing. I\'m 5\'1", 36DD and ordered a Large. The fit in the bust area was relaxed as expected, but it was much longer than the listing.The chart says bust 40.6" and length 27.6"Here are the measurements from my size largeLength=29" from shoulder. Bust= 42" Width at the hem= 48" Side slits = 5.25"It like the style but it is too long. The low quality makes alterations not worth while.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 11, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Cute. Comfy. Good fit.', 'author': 'I Love to Read!', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Love it.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 13, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Laundered well enough', 'author': 'Gail', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I usually wear between an XL and an XXL. I do like my shirts to fit nicely without accentuating my bulges. The XXL still fits nice but as you can see in the second picture there is quite a bit of Slack. But, it hangs well, so it doesn\'t look like a bag. It is formed in the waist and flares at the hips and is just the right length for me. The third picture is the XL where there really isn\'t a lot of extra fabric in the waist, but it fits just right in the chest and waist. I wouldn\'t want it any tighter though. What I like about the XL is it still feels loose enough in the back so as not to show any back bulges. I have 3 different colors now.I\'ve washed and tumbled dried 3 of them so far, but inside out and in a laundry pouch so the fabric won\'t pill in the cycles. It seems like it could still get a little "furry over time, as you can see in the close up picture of the two shirts, new and worn a few times before laundering. I am a hairsylist, so I\'m always looking for printed shirts that will hide color stains and lightening from bleach drips.These, though they aren\'t cotton, still seem like they still could bleach out. They aren\'t sold for that reason, but some fabrics don\'t bleach. I am going to keep both, the XL.Will update after time of the quality changes.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States April 30, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '2.0 out of 5 stars Odd shape and unflattering', 'author': 'Tim', 'rating': 2, 'content': 'The shirt looks cute on the model. However, when I put it on it is a very unflattering cut and the white on the bottom shows any but of weight you have on your stomach. It has high slits on the side which looks kind of weird. The fabric is soft and good quality.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 18, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Great fit, comfy - bought 3.', 'author': 'Elliz', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I’ve purchased 3 of these tops. I’ve been in the garment industry in manufacturing and design. I’ve worked for Nordstrom, as well......so my review is gonna reflect some picky and detailed observations. I’ve been preparing to retire and realized I needed some “relaxed-comfortable-at-home” clothing that doesn’t look like I’m still in pajamas all day.I’m normally a Nordstrom, Chico’s, Soft Surroundings customer. However, budget is also more of a consideration now. I’m not gonna pay $80 for an at-home shirt.But basic good quality and construction still matters to me.Size: I’m 5’8” and a busty Size 14. I purchased the XL for an easy fit - even as I am losing weight. (Funny how that happens easier when you leave a stressful job, but I digress).Length: Definitely NOT long enough to wear with leggings if you are over the age of 30 and your butt doesn’t look like Margot Robbie.I first ordered the navy color to go with long skirts and flip flops or sneakers. Great top. Comfy easy fit. The sleeves are not a set-in sleeve. They are a dolman sleeve, so you don’t get that “pull” across the back. I’m also in Arizona, so the heat was a big consideration.It washed well in cold water - didn’t fade, but I also hang things to dry.I immediately bought 2 of the tropical print to go with cargo pants. I swear the prints do fit just a BIT smaller. It IS a different fabric than the solid - a jersey knit. (Time will tell if the garment was constructed correctly with ball-point needles. If not, little holes will appear at the seam lines after several washings. It’s an industry thing that is sometimes ignored.)The only thing I observe while new is that the top-stitching at the hem is basically a large basting stitch and I can see it letting go with wear over time.For the cost of the garment - I will mend if that happens.Travel: Ideal! One huge plus is that this will be a great versatile shirt for travel. Roll it up for wear with shorts, jeans, skirts.If the 3 shirts I bought still get high praise from me after about 6-10 washings, I will buy more of these.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States May 8, 2020', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars So soft', 'author': 'Heather', 'rating': 4, 'content': "This tee is really soft and a great length for me as a 5'8 girly. Ordering an XXL you will receive a 2xl which the fit isn't quote the same for these sizes. So I was a little too big on me. The white is slightly see through.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 25, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': "4.0 out of 5 stars It's a nice top for the price", 'author': 'Debbie M.', 'rating': 4, 'content': "It fits true to sizeI'm planning on ordering more", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 5, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Long Sleeve Tops for Women 2023 Womens T Shirts for Women Fitted Shirts

title: Women's Short Sleeve Tee, Style 3333
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Runs Small', 'author': 'C. Arnold', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Well-made, soft, 100% cotton T-shirt that comes in wonderful colors. Finding cotton clothing is difficult nowadays, as a lot of clothing is made of synthetic fibers (polyester, acrylic and nylon), all of which come from plastic. These are great T-shirt's, but they do run small. For example, I prefer my casual t's to be on the baggy side -- relaxed and comfy. I usually wear a large for that, but in Comfort Colors, I need an XX-large. The best way to find out the perfect fit is to buy one in your usual size and another in a size or two bigger. Having t-shirts in a snug fit for some outfits and a lose fit for others works for some people. In any case, for a super well-made, quality cotton t-shirt, you can't beat the price!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 23, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Nice T-shirt and fast delivery', 'author': 'Mary U.', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Lovely butter yellow color and nice soft T-shirt...was just way too large to fit. The cut is outstanding for my body - I\'m 5\'8" and a decently proportioned 165 lbs. so on advice from other reviewers I bought a large to make sure it wasn\'t too snug. The shirt is long enough that when I reach up, it doesn\'t hike up above my waist, but it\'s also slim enough to look and feel like a shirt cut for a woman\'s body. I can forgive the color variations because the Chalky Mint is very pretty despite it being a little brighter than advertised. The shirt is well-constructed and with my intent to wash in cold water and line-dry, I expect it to last a VERY long time. Overall: this is a great shirt for a great price. Highly recommended.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States May 19, 2020', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Great quality', 'author': 'Lambert', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Great quality shirts that hold up well', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 24, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Brandnew shirt.', 'author': 'Joann', 'rating': 3, 'content': "This shirt I like it but one thing is it has an odor to it like a body odor or something like that and if it's brand new it should not have a body odor.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 18, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

I ordered the purple, which is a beautiful color!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 3, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': "3.0 out of 5 stars Not sure I'm going to keep it", 'author': 'MaeMaeT', 'rating': 3, 'content': "Ok, here's what I love about the sweater:It's lightweight, comfortable, and doesn't sit on your skin. I love that it's long enough that it won't ride up and big enough (especially for a girl like me) that I can knot it in the front. The fact that it's not see through.... I could kiss the ground for that fact alone.Here's what I DON'T like:The color was off. I rarely read the color descriptions (my fault, I know) but the gray looked more seafoam to me and I was oh so excited about that. After reading other reviews I see this is a pretty common deception with this sweater.I pulled it out of the package wrinkled and inside out, so I know they didn't go through a ton of trouble to repackage it from the last person who bought it.Here's the problem with sweaters for big girls: they look nondescript. There's not enough definition and that makes a soft body look just flat out frumpy. Maybe that's more of a body perception ick but it's worth mentioning for my type of girls.It's not nearly as off the shoulder as it seems in the picture. Like my shoulders are begging for air and can't get it because I'm not as petite as the models they drape with two-sizes-too-big clothing.All in all, I think it's a nice sweater, but not a great one. I ordered the blue with the boho looking large circular print. It looks fantastic on the model, of course, but not so flattering if you are a size 12. When opened, I noticed the material is polyester-ish stretch (I actually like that for the look of smoothness and ease of laundering). That said, the pattern/colors do NOT look at all like the photo -- it looks ... well ... polyester. I do NOT believe for one second that this is 90% cotton and 10% rayon -- it\'s SO stretchy and sleek - my skin detects NO cotton at all, feels poly/spandex. So I could still live with that since it\'s a nifty fresh pattern. Fit was further disappointment. Size XXL: for a size 12, 5\'4" the shoulders and chest fit very nice, sleek, drapey, and not too tight or baggy. The problem that it is SO long, and tight through the hips (and over bum) that there\'s simply no way to make that look good on a size 12 in that material. Hugs my jeans so the outline of the back pockets and zipper show. So, tight from top of hips to under bum. I\'m not sending back - I like it so well, I\'m considering having it shortened by 3" or maybe there\'s a way to tuck in and drape.
